body_html: It seems to have been a deliberate stylistic choice not to define repr within tensorflow. Not being a python enthusiast myself, I can't comment on the virtues of that decision. If you feel differently, perhaps the tensorflow discussion group would be a good place to raise the issue. [https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=footer#!forum/discuss]
body_text: It seems to have been a deliberate stylistic choice not to define repr within tensorflow.  Not being a python enthusiast myself, I can't comment on the virtues of that decision. body: It seems to have been a deliberate stylistic choice not to define **repr** within tensorflow.  Not being a python enthusiast myself, I can't comment on the virtues of that decision.  If you feel differently, perhaps the tensorflow discussion group would be a good place to raise the issue.  [https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=footer#!forum/discuss]
